TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConditionalAccessInstanceOperation implements class Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.IOperation

Docs.summary:
Represents the value of a conditionally-accessed operation within . For a conditional access operation of the form someExpr?.Member, this operation is used as the InstanceReceiver for the right operation Member. See https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/21279#issuecomment-323153041 for more details.
Current usage: (1) C# conditional access instance expression. (2) VB conditional access instance expression.
Docs.remarks: This interface is reserved for implementation by its associated APIs. We reserve the right to change it in the future.
